Description:
The FPP Development Supervisor is responsible for Co-packing & Assist the product Development & improvement Process under management of R&D manager and in accordance with company strategy & standards.Fully responsible on daily internal & external activities related to co-packing process to ensure smooth supply of all products that are produced under company brands based on required volume & quality standards.
Lead & organize new product development process inside the factory with production & quality teams to achieve the targets based on overall project’s scopes and timeline.
Responsible for evaluating Product’s Specifications and doing Technical Audits for all new raw materials, Packaging materials & Ingredients from new supplies including design protocols, conduct trials, quality evaluation, shelf life study, and stability testing assuring that any new material is complying with company standards.
Design & apply all required procedures & standards of new products and reins changes in current product procedures & standards based on company quality system. And follow up the implementation with all related departments.
Ensuring all new products are complying with ISO, SASO, MEWA & SFDA & quality management system.
Identify and initiate corrective actions for any deviation with regard to products, processes and related to food safety and quality management system.
Assist R&D Manager in other tasks that might raise and/or during his absence.Skills

Flexibility
Cooperation & Teamwork
Organizing & Communication
Creative & Proactive
Team leader & Department Management
